channel.title: Black Mesa won't launch on Windows 8 x64
channel.description: I did a fresh install a few days ago, and it appears I can't play it through Steam now. I've googled, the admin trick doesn't work for me. Let me know your solutions or settings if you're running on windows 8, thank you.

item.title: Black Mesa won't launch on Windows 8 x64
item.dc:creator: jeeyi345
item.description:
I did a fresh install a few days ago, and it appears I can’t play it through Steam now.
I’ve googled, the admin trick doesn’t work for me.
Let me know your solutions or settings if you’re running on windows 8, thank you.
